mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.user_name userName, t.mobile_no mobileNo, t.bank_no bankNo, t.credt_no credtNo, t.contract_st contractSt, t.user_name_acntIsVerif userNameAcntIsVerif, t.bank_no_acntIsVerif bankNoAcntIsVerif, t.credt_no_acntIsVerif credtNoAcntIsVerif, t.mobile_no_acntIsVerif mobileNoAcntIsVerif, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime FROM `t_gq_fss_pos_back` t
